features.featureTitle: Reduce perceived and actual Solo startup latency by tightening the Solo readiness fallback path so the UI reaches the playable terminal state with fewer delays when `startMatchAndGetLobby` returns a lobby that is not yet ready (active + non-null currentChallenge). This includes tuning the bounded retry/backoff delays used by Solo readiness polling to favor faster early retries while remaining within the overall Solo init timeout.

Improve the Solo initialization loading UX messaging so progress feels more responsive during slower startups: display phase-specific English progress text and include elapsed time during `INITIALIZING_SOLO_MODE` to reassure users the game is still working while polling for readiness.
